Name: Still Eye of the Dragon
Effect: Worn on the finger, this item increases your Luck and Morale by +1.

Name: Clover of Fortune
Effect: The Clover of Fortune increases your Luck by +1.

Name: Cards of Prophecy
Effect: The Cards of Prophecy increase your Luck by +1.

Name: Ladybird of Luck
Effect: The Ladybird of Luck increases your Luck by +1.

Name: Badge of Courage
Effect: The Badge of Courage increases your Morale by +1 and confers Mind spell immunity.

Name: Crest of Valor
Effect: The Crest of Valor increases your Morale by +1.

Name: Glyph of Gallantry
Effect: The Glyph of Gallantry increases your Morale by +1.

Name: Speculum
Effect: The Speculum increases your Scouting radius by +1.

Name: Spyglass
Effect: The Spyglass increases your Scouting radius by +1.

Name: Amulet of the Undertaker
Effect: Worn about the neck, this amulet increases your Necromancy skill by 5%.

Name: Vampire's Cowl
Effect: Worn about the shoulders, this cowl increases your Necromancy skill by 10%.

Name: Dead Man's Boots
Effect: Worn on the feet, these boots increase your Necromancy skill by 15%.

Name: Garniture of Interference
Effect: Worn about the neck, this item increases your Magic Resistance by 5%.

Name: Surcoat of Counterpoise
Effect: Worn about the shoulders, this item increases your Magic Resistance by 10%.

Name: Boots of Polarity
Effect: Worn on the feet, these boots increase your Magic Resistance by 15%.

Name: Bow of Elven Cherrywood
Effect: This bow increases your Archery skill by 5%.

Name: Bowstring of the Unicorn's Mane
Effect: This bowstring increases your Archery skill by 10%.

Name: Angel Feather Arrows
Effect: These arrows increase your Archery skill by 15%.

Name: Bird of Perception
Effect: This figurine increases your eagle eye skill by 5%.

Name: Stoic Watchman
Effect: This figurine increases your eagle eye skill by 10%.

Name: Emblem of Cognizance
Effect: This item increases your eagle eye skill by 15%.

Name: Statesman's Medal
Effect: Worn about the neck, the Statesman's Medal reduces the cost of surrendering.

Name: Diplomat's Ring
Effect: Worn on the finger, the Diplomat's Ring reduces the cost of surrendering.

Name: Ambassador's Sash
Effect: Worn about the shoulders, the Ambassador's Sash reduces the cost of surrendering.

Name: Ring of the Wayfarer
Effect: When placed on the finger, this ring increases the combat speed of all your units by +1.

Name: Equestrian's Gloves
Effect: Worn on the hands, these gloves increase your hero's movement rate over land.

Name: Necklace of Ocean Guidance
Effect: Worn about the neck, this necklace increases your hero's movement rate at sea.

Name: Angel Wings
Effect: Worn about the shoulders, these wings allow you to fly.

Name: Charm of Mana
Effect: This charm helps you recover 1 extra spell point per day.

Name: Talisman of Mana
Effect: This talisman helps you recover 2 extra spell points per day.

Name: Mystic Orb of Mana
Effect: This orb helps you recover 3 extra spell points per day.

Name: Collar of Conjuring
Effect: Worn about the neck, this item increases the duration of all your spells by 1.

Name: Ring of Conjuring
Effect: Worn on a finger, this item increases the duration of all your spells by 2.

Name: Cape of Conjuring
Effect: Worn about the shoulders, this item increases the duration of all your spells by 3.

Name: Orb of the Firmament
Effect: This powerful orb causes your Air spells to inflict an additional 50% damage.

Name: Orb of Silt
Effect: This powerful orb causes your Earth spells to inflict an additional 50% damage.

Name: Orb of Tempestuous Fire
Effect: This powerful orb causes your Fire spells to inflict an additional 50% damage.

Name: Orb of Driving Rain
Effect: This powerful orb causes your Water spells to inflict an additional 50% damage.

Name: Recanter's Cloak
Effect: While wearing this cloak, neither you nor your opponent will be able to cast level 3 or higher spells during combat.

Name: Spirit of Oppression
Effect: This item negates all morale bonuses during combat for both you and your opponent.

Name: Hourglass of the Evil Hour
Effect: This item negates all Luck bonuses during combat for both you and your opponent.

Name: Tome of Fire Magic
Effect: This heavy book contains all spells in the school of Fire Magic.

Name: Tome of Air Magic
Effect: This heavy book contains all spells in the school of Air Magic.

Name: Tome of Water Magic
Effect: This heavy book contains all spells in the school of Water Magic.

Name: Tome of Earth Magic
Effect: This heavy book contains all spells in the school of Earth Magic.

Name: Boots of Levitation
Effect: When worn, these boots allow you to walk across water.

Name: Golden Bow
Effect: When wielded, the Golden Bow allows your troops to shoot through any obstacle or at any range without penalty.

Name: Sphere of Permanence
Effect: Wielding this sphere renders your units immune to the Dispel spell.

Name: Orb of Vulnerability
Effect: During combat, this orb negates the natural magic resistance of all creatures on the battlefield.

Name: Ring of Vitality
Effect: This item increases the health of all your units by +1.

Name: Ring of Life
Effect: This item increases the health of all your units by +1.

Name: Vial of Lifeblood
Effect: This item increases the health of all your units by +2.

Name: Necklace of Swiftness
Effect: Worn about the neck, this necklace increases the combat speed of all your units by +1.

Name: Boots of Speed
Effect: Worn on the feet, these boots increase your hero's movement rate over land.

Name: Cape of Velocity
Effect: Worn about the shoulders, this cape increases the combat speed of all your units by +2.

Name: Pendant of Dispassion
Effect: Wearing this item renders your units immune to the Berserk spell.

Name: Pendant of Second Sight
Effect: Wearing this item renders your units immune to the Blind spell.

Name: Pendant of Holiness
Effect: Wearing this item renders your units immune to the Curse spell.

Name: Pendant of Life
Effect: Wearing this item renders your units immune to the Death Ripple spell.

Name: Pendant of Death
Effect: Wearing this item renders your units immune to the Destroy Undead spell.

Name: Pendant of Free Will
Effect: Wearing this item renders your units immune to the Hypnotize spell.

Name: Pendant of Negativity
Effect: Wearing this item renders your units immune to the Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells.

Name: Pendant of Total Recall
Effect: Wearing this item renders your units immune to the Forgetfulness spell.

Name: Pendant of Courage
Effect: When worn, this item bestows +3 Luck and Morale to your hero's troops.

Name: Everflowing Crystal Cloak
Effect: When worn, this cloak increases your Crystal production by +1 per day.

Name: Ring of Infinite Gems
Effect: When worn, this ring increases your Gem production by +1 per day.

Name: Everpouring Vial of Mercury
Effect: When equipped, this vial increases your Mercury production by +1 per day.

Name: Inexhaustible Cart of Ore
Effect: When equipped, this cart provides you with an additional +1 Ore per day.

Name: Eversmoking Ring of Sulfur
Effect: When worn, this ring increases your Sulfur production by +1 per day.

Name: Inexhaustible Cart of Lumber
Effect: When equipped, this cart provides you with an additional +1 Wood per day.

Name: Endless Sack of Gold
Effect: When equipped, the Endless Sack of Gold increases your income by 1000 gold per day.

Name: Endless Bag of Gold
Effect: When equipped, the Endless Bag of Gold increases your income by 750 gold per day.

Name: Endless Purse of Gold
Effect: When equipped, the Endless Purse of Gold increases your income by 500 gold per day.

Name: Legs of Legion
Effect: This item, when equipped by a hero in a town, increases the growth of your 2nd level units (in that town) by 5 per week.

Name: Loins of Legion
Effect: This item, when equipped by a hero in a town, increases the growth of your 3rd level units (in that town) by 4 per week.

Name: Torso of Legion
Effect: This item, when equipped by a hero in a town, increases the growth of your 4th level units (in that town) by 3 per week.

Name: Arms of Legion
Effect: This item, when equipped by a hero in a town, increases the growth of your 5th level units (in that town) by 2 per week.

Name: Head of Legion
Effect: This item, when equipped by a hero in a town, increases the growth of your 6th level units (in that town) by 1 per week.

Name: Sea Captain's Hat
Effect: When worn, this hat increases your movement at sea, allows you to summon and destroy boats, and protects you from whirlpools.

Name: Spellbinder's Hat
Effect: When worn, this hat allows you to cast all 5th level spells.

Name: Shackles of War
Effect: When these shackles are wielded in combat, neither you nor your opponent may retreat or surrender.

Name: Orb of Inhibition
Effect: This powerful orb prevents all spell casting in combat.
